attributes.action: FULL PUBLIC ENQUIRY INTO WHAT HAS GONE WRONG AT THE ROYAL BOLTON HOSPITAL
attributes.additional_details:
CALL FOR A FULL PUPLIC ENQUIRY TO WHAT HASGONE WRONG AT THE ROYAL BOLTON HOSPITAL, BOLTON LANCASHIRE. TO INVESTIGATE THEFINANCIAL MISS-MANAGEMENT, TO UNCERCOVER WHERE THE MISSING MILLIONS HAVE GONE. WHY THE HOSPITAL IS IN SO MUCH DEBT.
TO ASERTAIN THE COVER UP OF MORTALITY FIGURES VIA FALSIFYING THE CAUSES OF DEATH. TO FIND OUT WHY THE HOSPITAL IS MISSING ITS TARGETS YET AT THE SAME TIME PLANNING TO MAKE UPTO 500 STAFF REDUNDENT. TO CALL FOR MORE PUBLIC INFORMATION RE THE STANDARDS OF CARE  AND HOW THINGS ARE GOING TO IMPROVE
